metadata.title: CVE-2021-47051 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: spi:fsl-lpspi: Fix PM reference leak in lpspi_prepare_xfer_hardware()pm_runtime_get_sync will increment pm usage counter even it failed.Forgetting to putting operation will result in reference leak here. Fix itby replacing it with pm_runtime_resume_and_get to keep usage counterbalanced.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-47051` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.13.0-16-generic - 4.13.0-16.19
